data.what_is: IMIcampaign is a Cloud-based marketing automation platform to plan and deliver contextual marketing conversations. It offers rich personalization; multi-channel campaign orchestration across Email, App Push, SMS, MMS, Voice and USSD; integrated 360-degree customer profiles; automated fulfillment; and comprehensive dashboards and reports. Leading telecom operators, banks, logistics providers and enterprises use IMIcampaign to engage with their customers, run promotions, and enhance conversions.
data.product_description: A true multi-channel campaign platform for creating the personalised micro-moments that captivate customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webex Campaign?
In a nut shell, imi campaign gives you the option to choose where you want to run your campaign, which is the best part since it has all the data and works very well.

What do you dislike about Webex Campaign?
I really like how it works, and there are no complaints about it. It is so easy to use and so effective that I do not see why there would be any improvement needed.

What problems is Webex Campaign solving and how is that benefiting you?
With the help of this software, businesses can effectively target potential buyers through social media or SMS and lure them to purchase their products and thus helping the business derive huge profits from the use of this software.
